GSD.product_version: versions from v5.9 to before v5.15.24
GSD.description:
net: dsa: felix: don't use devres for mdiobus

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.24 by commit 8cda7577a0b4018572f31e0caadfabd305ea2786, it was introduced in version v5.9 by commit ac3a68d56651c3dad2c12c7afce065fe15267f44. For more details please see the references link.
